actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-351.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H. R. 6884, a bill to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to authorize international security assistance programs for fiscal year l978, to amend the Arms Export Control Act to make certain changes in the authorities of that Act.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 6884 (International security and arms export).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H. R. 6884, a bill to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to authorize international security assistance programs for fiscal year l978, to amend the Arms Export Control Act to make certain changes in the authorities of that Act.
